config.platforms.markdownDescription: Currently supported Git hosting platforms: GitHub, Coding, GitLab, TGit. You can customize the URL template for each platform. Available template variables: {repo:path}, {branch}, {file:path}, {file:name}, {file:dir}, {remote:url}, {remote:url:path:n} (where n is the position of path segment, starting from 0)
config.platforms.items.urlTemplate.descr: URL template for the platform. Available variables: {repo:path}, {branch}, {file:path}, {file:name}, {file:dir}, {remote:url}, {remote:url:path:n} etc.
config.domainRegistry.markdownDescriptio: Currently supported domains: github.com, gitlab.com, gitee.com, e.coding.net etc.
config.domainRegistry.items.platform.des: Platform name that matches one of the defined platforms
config.useCompactMenu.markdownDescriptio: When enabled, all GitLink commands will be grouped under a single submenu to reduce clutter in context menus. When disabled, main commands will appear directly in the context menu.
config.rememberRemoteSelection.markdownD: When enabled, the extension will remember your remote selection for the current session. You'll only be prompted to select a remote once per project session. When disabled, you'll be prompted each time.
